contentItem.name: com.silabs.content.demos.c8051f970dk.kit.si8051.c8051f970dk.demo.f97x_ports_switchled
contentItem.label: Ports SwitchLED
contentItem.description:
Basic digital IO Example

This example project shows how to setup pins as either digital outputs or inputs. 

The user can press the buttons BTN03 and BTN04 to toggle LED05 and LED15.
